name: Create3
description: A library for deploying contracts EIP-3171 style.

functionDecorators.name: create3
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new contract with given `_creationCode` and `_salt`.

parameterDecorators.name: _salt
parameterDecorators.description: Salt of the contract creation, resulting address will be derivated from this value only.

parameterDecorators.name: _creationCode
parameterDecorators.description: Creation code (constructor) of the contract to be deployed, this value doesn't affect the resulting address.

returnDecorators.name: addr
returnDecorators.description: of the deployed contract, reverts on error.

functionDecorators.name: create3
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new contract with given `_creationCode` and `_salt`.

parameterDecorators.name: _salt
parameterDecorators.description: Salt of the contract creation, resulting address will be derivated from this value only.

parameterDecorators.name: _creationCode
parameterDecorators.description: Creation code (constructor) of the contract to be deployed, this value doesn't affect the resulting address.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: In WEI of ETH to be forwarded to child contract.

returnDecorators.name: addr
returnDecorators.description: of the deployed contract, reverts on error.
